Characteristic.name: Digital

InformativeText.Summary: The Digital characteristic is used to expose and change the state of an IO Module's digital signals.

Field.name: Digital
Field.InformativeText: The Digital characteristic is an array of n 2-bit values in a bit field

Characteristic.Note: The Octet Order in the above table is in the order of LSO to MSO, where LSO = Least Significant Octet and MSO = Most Significant Octet.
